title: Knife, ca. 1798–1809
provenance: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, Gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Straight-sided blade, upper edge tapering towards the point, drop bolster and plain silver ferrule. Pistol-shaped handle of carved ivory with beaded cresting on top of handle and halfway on one side. End of handle carved on front and back with snail-shell and drop-shaped ornaments.

exhibitions.title: Feeding Desire: Design and the Tools of the Table, 1500-2005

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1798–1809.
ca. 1798–1809. Ivory, steel, silver. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-197.
